definition: to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged

sentences.chinese: 她獲准喪假爲父親送葬。

sentences.english: I asked for three days' leave to arrange my father's funeral affairs.
sentences.chinese: 我請了三天的喪假來處理父親的後事。
